channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks saw more volatility than bitcoin did amid tariff chaos. That doesn’t happen often.
item.description: Bitcoin is known for big price swings, but U.S. stock indexes last week saw volatility hit levels on par with the cryptocurrency as investors reacted ...

item.title: Fund managers have never turned so pessimistic this quickly on U.S. stocks, a survey finds
item.description: Fund managers have quickly become pessimistic on U.S. stocks after the introduction of Trump administration tariffs.

item.title: Citigroup CEO is betting the U.S. economy can weather the tariff storm
item.description: Citi’s Jane Fraser looks past the current trade-policy turmoil and says the dollar will retain its position as global reserve currency.

item.title: Ericsson’s stock is climbing after strong results. Thank tariff stockpiling.
item.description: The Swedish networking and telecom company reported sharply higher net income in the first quarter of 2025, boosting its shares.

item.title: Johnson & Johnson raises sales outlook, even with tariff costs accounted for
item.description: J&J beat quarterly profit and revenue expectations and raised its dividend but didn’t change its profit outlook, and the stock pulled back.

item.title: Barclays downgrades this U.S. automaker because of tariffs, sees more than 10% downside
item.description: The bank downgraded the Detroit automaker to equal weight from overweight and slashed its price target on the name by $30 to $40.

item.title: This cruise stock can more than double from here and withstand a slowing consumer, Citi says
item.description: While worries of declining consumer confidence have recently plagued the market, Citi thinks this cruise stock may be able to withstand any potential ...

item.title: Here are Tuesday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Nike, Costco, Microsoft, Netflix, KKR & more
item.description: Here are Tuesday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: This software stock can outperform in a tech rebound. Using options to trade it
item.description: As we bounce off the lows, it's no surprise that the tech sector, which led the market downward, is now emerging as a leading force in the recovery.

item.title: Nvidia can survive tariff uncertainty and is a top pick, says Redburn Atlantic
item.description: Nvidia may be able to weather a semiconductor slowdown induced by tariff uncertainty, according to Redburn Atlantic.

item.title: Banco Macro’s 10.3% Surge: Is This Argentine Bank a Hidden Gem?

item.title: MP Materials: Riding the Wave of Rare Earth Metals Demand

item.title: Gold Rush: Newmont Corporation Soars on Record Gold Prices and Tariff Uncertainty
item.description: The gold market is shining bright, with prices hitting record highs as investors flock to safe-haven assets amidst economic uncertainty. And one stock...

item.title: The AI Revolution in Biotech: Recursion Pharmaceuticals Soars 19.18% on FDA’s New Approach to Animal Testing
